column5: Here is another finished painting.  "It's Too Cold", photo reference courtesy of Slowpoke.  Thanks again.    Pam
Very Nice work
Another excellent painting  Well done  Whopper
It's another beautiful painting! Great job! Dave
That's amazing Pam, I've always thought people and faces would be the hardest thing to paint and you nailed that one.
I agree with GbayGiant, the faces look great. Nice work indeed.
That is GREAT
Great work pam.
Success again....looks beautiful!!!   bly

Nice painting indeed Pam.  As you watch your kids growing up, it's fun to observe them developing thier own personality. Watching the progress of this painting on Pam's website was much the same. Seemingly random strokes of colour coming together to depict thier true personalities.  In an attempt to broaden thier taste horizons I sometimes bribe them to try new things. One night at a buffet I offered $1.00 to try frogs legs.  Guess who boosted thier allowance that week, Sarah on the left or Hannah on the right?  Thanks again Pam, this will be a Mother's Day to remember for my wife and mother-in-law. -Brian
I think that one is awesome and for me personally my favorite i have seen so far from those you have shared with us pam.  Well done again awesome job.
You definitely captured the moment. Very well done.
Awesome,and you worried about painting people. You just needed a push.LOL   Great job Pam.

Thanks everyone, and yes, misfish, it's your doing me getting into painting people.  I guess I should THANK YOU.  I have always loved portraits and I can put them in a landscape at the same time!  Pam
Great job Pam!  Every painting gets better!
Amazing talent Pam. I agree that it's one of your best yet. Keep them coming.
Very very nice Pam, WTG!
you really have a knack for bringing your paintings to life Pam.  Very nice ..... very nice indeed.
Good stuff as always Pam, thanks for sharing.  Maureen
Really nice...
Great work Pam,and amazing talent
Very nice painting!
